Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring certain agencies to publish guidance on responding to settlement offers, translate such guidance into the designated citywide languages, and notify settlement offer recipients about such guidance
Items.MatterName: Requiring certain agencies to publish guidance on responding to settlement offers, translate such guidance into the designated citywide languages, and notify settlement offer recipients about such guidance.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to translation services for compliance materials

A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing supplemental language access services in connection with temporary language needs
Items.MatterName: Providing supplemental language access services in connection with temporary language needs.
